name: Slow Fashion Social
description: A monthly social to meet others who are interested in sustainable fashion. The social will be run as a workshop to learn new craft and mending skills together. No sewing or fashion experience required and all materials will be provided!
details: This is an inclusive group (we're not too worried about straight stitches!) for people who want to have a more sustainable wardrobe.

location.address: The Canteen Bristol, 80 Stokes Croft, Bristol BS1 3QY

booking.details: Tickets must be booked in advance. Please see the website or Instagram for more information.

cost.details: The price per event may vary; the June 2025 event had general admission tickets listed at £10 and reduced income tickets for £5.
